item.name: Suppliers

response.name: Get Suppliers

item.description:
**GET** `/api/inventory/suppliers/`

- List all suppliers.
    

**POST** `/api/inventory/suppliers/`

- Create a new supplier.
    
- Request body: `{ "name": "Supplier Name", "contact_info": "Contact Information" }`
    

**GET** `/api/inventory/suppliers/{id}/`

- Retrieve a single supplier by ID.
    

**PATCH** `/api/inventory/suppliers/{id}/`

- Update a supplier by ID.
    
- Request body: `{ "name": "Updated Name", "contact_info": "Updated Contact Information" }`
    

**DELETE** `/api/inventory/suppliers/{id}/`

- Delete a supplier by ID.

item.name: Inventory Item

response.name: Get Items

header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

item.description:
**GET** `/api/inventory/items/`

- List all items.
    

**POST** `/api/inventory/items/`

- Create a new item.
    
- Request body: `{ "name": "Item Name", "description": "Item Description", "price": 99.99, "suppliers": [1, 2] }`
    
- The `suppliers` field should be a list of supplier IDs.
    

**GET** `/api/inventory/items/{id}/`

- Retrieve a single item by ID.
    

**PATCH** `/api/inventory/items/{id}/`

- Update an item by ID.
    
- Request body: `{ "name": "Updated Name", "description": "Updated Description", "price": 99.99, "suppliers": [1, 2] }`
    
- The `suppliers` field should be a list of supplier IDs.
    

**DELETE** `/api/inventory/items/{id}/`

- Delete an item by ID.
    

Note: The response for creating and updating items will include the associated supplier data in the `supplier_data` field.
